rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 17 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat) and Severe Tropical Storm WIPHA (FORMERLY "CRISING")

Issued at: 5:00 PM, 19 July 2025(Saturday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Zambales, Bataan, Metro Manila, Pampanga, Bulacan, Cavite, Batangas and Rizal.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: Possible FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Tarlac, Nueva Ecija, Quezon and Laguna which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
